summary: An insurance lawyer unhappy with his rate of company advancement becomes a middleman in deals to recover stolen property from the Mob, thus earning a nice living. But his actions attract police attention and set him up for a double-cross.

keywords: jewelry heist|insurance fraud|romantic triangle|manipulative woman|man in the middle
title: No Questions Asked
